reading.text_en: Aruzhan has many friends at school. They like drawing and playing games together.
reading.text_ru: Аружан имеет много друзей в школе. Им нравится рисовать и играть вместе.

listening.script_en: Hello! My name is Bayan. My friend is kind and smart. We play chess after school.
listening.script_ru: Привет! Меня зовут Баян. Мой друг добрый и умный. Мы играем в шахматы после школы.

questions.q: What do Bayan and his friend play?

speaking_prompts: Describe your best friend (name, age, hobby).
What do you do together after school?
writing_tasks: Write three sentences about your best friend.
Write a short postcard to your friend.
